# `my_growMeans`

my_growMeans


## Description

geometric rowMeans that works for a single column


## Usage

```r
my_growMeans(x, offset = 0.1)
my_growMeans(x, offset = 0.1)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`x`     |     data to use
`offset`     |     offset
